item.title: Arthur Penty and the Guild System
item.description:
Circling an Idea

There have been several books that I’ve encountered in my life that really were moments not of revelation, but of cementation: all the random jostling thoughts in my head coalescing in another’s writings. Or perhaps, “permission to think” a certain way.

Arthur Penty’s Restoration of Gild Systems is such a book.

We say over and over again, “if you’re not paying, you’re the product, not the customer” in regards to social media. But Penty said it better and much harsher:
